Package model

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Person
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MovieGoer, Staff

    public abstract class Person
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an abstract Person and some of its common attributes in the booking system.
    Since:
    2017-11-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Amos

      • validateIdentity

        public abstract boolean validateIdentity​(java.lang.String email,
                                         java.lang.String password)
        Forces the specialisation of person to implement the way the account is validated.
        Parameters:
        email - Email of the person
        password - Password of the person
        Returns:
        Result of the validation. True if success. False if failed.
